about_the_game:
You and your friend return to his home in the city, which after the nuclear war and the appearance of the "Goro" mutants will no longer be the same "home". You will survive and fight with creatures that become more dangerous each new level. But you need to go through this to collect local riches!

STARTMOVE IS:
  • Realistic graphics, cut scenes, atmospheric sound design
  • Several missions - 1 hour of game time with various elements of the gameplay
  • You will be able to drive the car and survive with the first person view during the game
  • Loadout - person/weapon modification (10 models of weapons in the game)
  • This is The Indie game Wave-Shooter with elements of stealth, search, survival horror and its own story

name: STARTMOVE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

You will survive and fight with creatures that become more dangerous each new level. But you need to go through this to collect local riches!
